detail: Rewarded with 5/5 rating during anniversary appraisal at TCS
Joined a new project in TCS as Java developer
Received appreciation by Project architect for designing UI layout for Homepage of the our project in TCS
Graduated from KJSCE as a proud IT engineer
Joined TCS Digital as software developer. Worked as Full stack developer in an internal project of TCS.
Received badge of 5 star rated coder on Codechef (2019)
Internship in Android development at KJSCE
4th Rank in Codewars 2019 (inter-departmental coding challenge of KJSCE)
Qualified for semi-finals in TechGig Code gladiator 2019 (Worldâ€™s largest coding contest)
Internship in Computer Vision and ML at AItoe Labs
Internship in language recognition at KJSCE

Born and brought up by probably one of the best parents. Self taught cycling and swimming. Saved injured stray pigeons, a sparrow and a kitten(not at the same time). Watched pokemon. Wrestled and defeated my younger brother several times. Basically enjoyed life to the fullest before 10th std board happened.
